## MatchManager.fetchMatchListByPlayer() method

Fetch a list of match IDs by a player ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetchMatchListByPlayer(player: Summoner | string, options?: MatchByPlayerOptions): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  player | [Summoner](./shieldbow.summoner.md) \| string | The summoner or their player ID whose matches need to be fetched. |
|  options | [MatchByPlayerOptions](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The options for filtering the matches. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;
